entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -25.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 03:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -25.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -30.6°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
